detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the image buttons
imgbtn
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the image button
imgbtn
pointer to a image button object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Create a image button object
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new image button
copy
pointer to a image button object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created image button

Set images for a state of the image button
imgbtn
pointer to an image button object
state
for which state set the new image (from lv_btn_state_t) `
src
pointer to an image source (a C array or path to a file)

Set a style of a image button.
imgbtn
pointer to image button object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Get the images in a given state
imgbtn
pointer to an image button object
state
the state where to get the image (from lv_btn_state_t) `
pointer to an image source (a C array or path to a file)

Get style of a image button.
imgbtn
pointer to image button object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to the style
